page.title: 17THE CHURCHES CONT.
page.content: a little piece of dogtooth moulding inserted in the wall.Cowley Church was built in the 13th C. probably on the foundations of an earlier building ,since the front is Norman.Edward 1 gave the church and manor to the noble Berkley family in whose possesion it remained until the dissoloution of the monastries when it passed to the Bish- opric of Westminster.The Manor had many owners until the early 20th C. when Sir James Horlick gave it and the village the appearence we know today. The three parishes of Coberley Cowley and Colesbourne are lead in Christianity by Canon S.I.Pulford.Who has served in this capasity for more than 20 yrs.and was recently made a Canon in Gloucester Cathedral.A Sunday school is held once a month in Coberley School.
